ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] The little things in life... (patch stuff)
ygData.msgSnippet: i don t know if that is the case, but it would be nice.  i always thought our skill in the instrument had an effect on our missed notes, and level was what
ygData.messageBody:
i don't know if that is the case, but it would be nice. i always thought
our skill in the instrument had an effect on our missed notes, and level was
what increased our song effectivness. it was all the missed notes at 50
people were getting that prompted them to just make 39+ songs 5% fixed
fizzle rate since our 200 skills were not helping. anyone know for sure,
please divulge =)

Shada

> I always thought your skill in singing/instrument had an
> impact on the mobs
> resist rate. So a 40 bard with a 200 skill in Wind can Pixie
> Strike a 35
> mob better than a 40 bard with only a 175 Wind skill.
>
> Galtin of E'ci
